name: RECONR
description: RECONR:Reconstructs pointwise cross sections from resonance parameters and linearizes.

parameters.name: nendf
parameters.description: Unit number for input ENDF tape
parameters.help: Integer unit number for the ENDF input file. Typically 20 for input.

parameters.name: npend
parameters.description: Unit number for output PEND file
parameters.help: Integer unit number for the PEND output file. Typically 21 for output.

parameters.name: mat
parameters.description: The material to be reconstructed (MAT number). Will be chosen by isotope name.
parameters.help: Select the isotope. The corresponding MAT number will be written automatically.

parameters.name: err
parameters.help: A small fraction representing the tolerance for reconstruction.

parameters.name: errmax
parameters.description: Fractional reconstruction tolerance used when resonance-integral error criterion is satisfied.
parameters.help: If provided, sets errmax and forces tempr=0.

parameters.name: errint
parameters.description: Maximum resonance-integral error per grid point.
parameters.help: If provided, sets a stricter error criterion.

cards.name: Advanced
cards.description: Parameters that are automatically generated and not shown to user.

parameters.name: tempr
parameters.description: Temperature set automatically if errmax is used.
parameters.help: If provided, sets a stricter error criterion.

cards.name: Automatic
cards.description: Parameters that are automatically generated and not shown to user.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Label for the new PENDF file.
